actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat as employees, for purposes of withholding and social security taxes, certain fishermen who comprise the operating crew of a boat if the operating crew normally consists of fewer than 6 individuals.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce from ten to six the maximum number of operating crewmen of a fishing boat necessary to qualify such crewmen as employees for purposes of withholding and social security taxes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat as employees, for purposes of withholding and social security taxes, certain fishermen who comprise the operating crew of a boat if the operating crew normally consists of fewer than 6 individuals.
